live_updates: Our crews have restored services to the area.  Thank you for your patience!
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
Several areas have had services restored. Technicians continue to bring remaining areas back online.
We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve the issue.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39697.summary: Some customers in the Valhalla area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to their Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39697.title: July 16 – Winnipeg (Valhalla) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
